        public int compareTo(Date date)
        Compares this date
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Date>
        Parameters:
        date - the object to be compared.
        Returns:
        1 if this date occurs after the specified date, -1 if this date occurs before the specified date, 0 if the dates are the same
